item.title: Mentioned by Xtra.ca
item.description:
Federal trans bill passes third reading
Conservative MPs who voted in favour of the bill included John Baird, Laurie Hawn and Shelly Glover. The bill will now go to the Senate. Liberal leadership candidate Justin Trudeau did not attend the vote. ... Liberal MP Hedy Fry voted in favour of the bill and says the step forward for human rights reminds her of the occasions when her party added sexual orientation to the Human Rights Act and passed same-sex marriage. “Important historic moments in Parliament make it worthwhile,” she says. Trans athlete Kristen ...
